MBLabs color ramp

Source: R/theme.R
brand.colors.Rd

Qualitative color ramp derived from active branding.

Usage

brand.colors(
  x = length(pal()),
  colors = pal()[!names(pal()) %in% c("white", "black", "light", "gray")],
  alpha = 0.9,
  ...
)

Arguments

x

number of colors to interpolate

colors

colors to interpolate; must be a valid argument to col2rgb().

alpha

logical: should alpha channel (opacity) values be returned? It is an error to give a true value if space is specified.

...

Arguments passed on to grDevices::colorRamp

bias

a positive number. Higher values give more widely spaced colors at the high end.

space

a character string; interpolation in RGB or Lab color spaces.

interpolate

use spline or linear interpolation.

Value

A function to interpolate colors

Examples

x <- rchisq(100, df=4)
hist(x, freq=FALSE, ylim=c(0, 0.2), col=brand.colors(20), border="white")

#> Warning: cannot open file '_brand.yml': No such file or directory
#> Error in file(file, "rt", encoding = fileEncoding): cannot open the connection
hist(x, freq=FALSE, ylim=c(0, 0.2), col=brand.colors(8, alpha=0.5), border="white")
#> Warning: cannot open file '_brand.yml': No such file or directory
#> Error in file(file, "rt", encoding = fileEncoding): cannot open the connection
